article_title: Ubernomics: Uber could have to pay billions if drivers are employees
article_text:

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Stephen Gandel

twitter.description: When a California judge ruled earlier this month that a lawsuit brought by Uber drivers could go forward as class-action, it re-opened the biggest question about the hottest company in Unicornland:...
twitter.title: Uber-nomics: Here’s what it would cost Uber to pay its driver...

article_metadata.keywords: uber, drivers, employees, $4 billion, class action lawsuit, unicorn, uber technologies
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Future of Work, jobs, The Age of Unicorns, Uber, unicorns, Work
article_metadata.description: Fortune crunched the numbers to determine how much it would cost Uber to hire its drivers as employees.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Uber-nomics: Here’s what it would cost Uber to pay its drivers as employees
article_metadata.news_keywords: Uber, drivers, employees, $4 billion, class action lawsuit, unicorn, Uber Technologies
article_metadata.sailthru.description: Fortune crunched the numbers. (Here's a hint: The result starts with a "b" and ends with an "s.")

og.title: The Cost Of Turning Uber Drivers Into Employees: $4.1 Billion
